price: 65. Markaasaa laga yeelay inay madaxa hoos u rogtaan18 (oo yidhaahdeen): Waad og tahay inayan kuwakani hadlin"!
arabic: ثُمَّ نُكِسُواْ عَلَىٰ رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتَ مَا هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يَنطِقُونَ
footnotes: 18. Kaddib markay qirteen gefkoodii, waxaa galay kibir iyo cinaad markaasay haddana ka horyimaadeen oo is rogeen.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma nukisū ʿalā ruūsihim laqad ʿalim'ta mā hāulāi yanṭiqūna
